title: Outlander season 5 trailer finally drops – and John Grey is back
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Outlander has had a bit of delay in the arrival of its fifth season but before it drops in February 2020 we finally have our first glimpse at the newest episodes of the time-travelling romance.

The trailer sees the first looks at our favourite characters together on the screen again; from Claire and Jamie, to Brianna and Roger and even a certain John Grey – the fifth run of Starz’s high-concept adaption looks to be its most dramatic and heart-wrenching yet.

Claire prepares for an uprising in Outlander season five (Picture: Starz)

The future (well, technically the past) certainly looks bleak for Claire and Jamie’s family as they must band together to survive. There’s also stronger hints than ever that a journey in time will happen and our heroine seems pretty determined to keep her brood safe. Whether that’s the future’s advanced weapons or medication, we’ll have to find out.

‘It’s safer in the future,’ we hear her say. ‘It’s time.’

We might be time-travelling again very soon in the fifth season of the romantic drama (Picture: Starz)

From the looks of a possible riot at Aunt Jocasta’s house to Roger wanting to go back to the 1960s, there will be plenty to keep fans patiently (or maybe not so patiently) waiting until the new year to find out what happens.

Of course, for most viewers the biggest revelation of the trailer is the return of John Grey. He was last seen in the fourth season grappling with his feelings for Jamie, and coming to an understanding with Claire that he was in love with her husband. Now, he looks set to make an almighty comeback, but why has he reappeared now? Could he even be hiding something?

We’ve also had several behind-the-scenes snaps at filming of the new serial, and it looks like viewers are in for a few surprises. Could Claire really time-travel again? It certainly appears that way from the pictures and hints in the new trailer.

Jamie’s loyalties will be tested in the new episodes (Picture: Starz)

Apparently Claire and Jamie aren’t out of the woods yet either as season five will see their relationship tested more than ever before. As if they haven’t been through enough!
